name: The Animator (Alternate)
description: Adds a new playable character, a new Act, 250+ cards, and 25+ relics. This is a standalone, unofficial version of The Animator with alternate card effects.
credits:
SFX: The Berklee College of Music, SquishiSprite, Zoltan Mihalyi, ViRiX
